alert.note: Alert for Haskell; Jones; Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 23 at 9:53PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Haskell, northeastern Jones, northwestern Shackelford and western Throckmorton Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 952 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Jud to near Tuxedo. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Haskell, Stamford, Rule, Rochester, Weinert, O`brien, Irby, Paint Creek, Sagerton, Millers Creek Reservoir, Lake Stamford Marina, Us- 277 Near The Haskell-Knox County Line, Jud, Us-380 Near The Haskell- Stonewall County Line and Tuxedo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Texas.
